title: SmokeLong Quarterly: The Best of the First Ten Years, 2003-2013
description: SmokeLong Quarterly, one of the oldest and prominent online publishers of flash fiction, has collected the "best of the first ten years" in this anthology of 56 pieces, each one a smoke-long. Also, after each piece, the editor/guest editor who chose that particular story for the anthology explains why s/he chose it, including past editors Kelly Spitzer & Kathy Fish, Founding Editor and Publisher Dave Clapper, Senior Editors Tara Laskowski & Nancy Stebbins, and staff editors Gay Degani, Josh Denslow, Ashley Inguanta, Beth Thomas, and Brandon Wicks.
author: Tara Laskowski
